content.rendered:
Ownership of Website and Legal background

Windsor Solutions Ltd is a Cypriot company and operates the website www.windsorbrokers.com which is used by Seldon Investments Limited (Jordan), an investment firm licensed by the JSC in Jordan, Windsor Brokers (BZ) Ltd, an investment firm licensed by the FSC in Belize, Windsor Brokers International Ltd, an investment firm licensed by the FSA in Seychelles with License no. SD072 and with registration number 8425783-1, situated at Scenic Car Hire Building No. G3, Parcel Nos: H1238, H1239, H7524, Majoie, Mahe, Seychelles and Windsor Markets (Kenya) Limited, an investment firm licensed by the CMA in Kenya (collectively ‘’Windsor Brokers’’).
All Intellectual Property rights herein are owned by Windsor Brokers, and Windsor Brokers reserves all rights herein. These terms are supplementary to any agreements and/or other legal documents between Windsor Brokers and the User of this website.

Access & Use of the Website & Disclaimer

By accessing and/or using this website and the services and products offered by Windsor Brokers, the User of the website agrees to be bound by the terms and conditions arising from the use of the website at any given time, in any given location and in accordance with the Windsor Brokers entity the User will proceed to open accounts with. Windsor Brokers reserves the right, at its absolute discretion, to suspend, modify, amend and/or cancel any access to this website, or any part thereof, including the products and services offered through this website. Windsor Brokers may change the terms and conditions, information and materials within this website, at any time and without prior notice to the User. It is the User’s responsibility to stay up to date with all information and/or changes to this website.
The User assumes the responsibility and obligation to ensure compliance with the laws, bylaws, regulations, directives if any, applicable in the User’s country of residence. The User of the website will be held responsible for any unauthorized use and/or any illegal acts related to the website.
The User understands and agrees, that this website does not constitute an offer and/or solicitation to buy or sell any products and/or services to any (legal) persons in any jurisdiction, where such products and/or services would be considered unlawful and/or prohibited. Therefore it is the User’s responsibility to comply with such laws in their respective jurisdiction, and in such cases the User will hold Windsor Brokers harmless from any and all consequences, damages, and/or liabilities that may occur as a result of any such prohibitions.
Contracts for Difference (CFD) are complex financial instruments carrying a substantial level of risk, and may not be suitable for all investors, as may result in loss of all invested capital rapidly due to leverage. You should consider whether you understand how CFDs work, your investment objectives, level of experience, risk appetite and, if necessary, seek advice from an independent financial advisor.
Windsor Brokers does not offer and/or sell its products and services to citizens or residents of the United States of America and/or any other jurisdiction where such distribution, publication or access is prohibited..
Windsor Brokers does not guarantee that access to the website and/or any of the products and services will be available at all times, or available in a specific jurisdiction at a specific time. Windsor Brokers will not be held liable for any consequential, incidental, special, punitive, or exemplary damages of whatsoever nature, arising out of any use and/or inability to use this Website and/or any of the products and/or services, nor will Windsor Brokers be held liable to the User for any lost profits, trading losses and/or damages that may result from use and/or unavailability to use this Website and/or any third party content, and/or any inconvenience and/or delay, including any loss resulting from a cause over which Windsor Brokers has no control over, including failure of communication lines. By using this Website, the User agrees to indemnify and hold harmless Windsor Brokers and/or third party providers (if any), from and against any and all claims, losses, liabilities, costs and expenses (including but not limited to attorneys’ fees) arising from the use of this Website and/or any violation of these terms and conditions.
The User may not make commercial use of the content of this website and/or include the content of this website in or with any other products and/or services that are created and/or distributed by the User, and the User may not copy, redistribute and/or modify the content of this website to the User’s own and/or another website, without obtaining the prior written permission from Windsor Brokers.
In the event that any term or condition herein is deemed invalid or unenforceable, such term or condition will be declared invalid and excluded, however the remaining provisions will remain in full force and effect.
Any translation of the content of this website, including products and/or services provided through this website, is made solely for the convenience of the Users. In the event of a dispute between the various language versions, the English version shall prevail.

Data and Confidentiality

Data provided via this website is provided only for informational and educational purposes. The User may obtain the advice of independent investment, financial, legal and tax advisors, if desired, before proceeding with any investments. All information provided via this website should not be read, interpreted or construed as investment advice and/or solicitation by Windsor Brokers, nor any of the entities within the Windsor Group, and their employees, officers, directors, affiliates, agents, service providers and/or licensors. This website does not take into consideration any investment goals, financial situation and/or specific requirements of any User. You should carefully consider your financial circumstances and goals before entering into any transactions, investments and/or Agreements.
The User understands and consents to the storage and processing of their personal data in accordance with applicable laws. Windsor Brokers applies strict confidentiality obligations on such data, unless Windsor Brokers is required and/or requested to disclose such data to supervisory bodies, competent authorities and/or courts.
The User is responsible and assumes all risks associated with the use and storage, of information on the User’s electronic devices by which access and use of this website is made.
It is the User’s responsibility to keep any account numbers, passwords and/or logins confidential at all times. The User authorizes Windsor Brokers to act on any instructions that Windsor Brokers reasonably considers that have been received from the User’s authorized communication channels.

Cookies

This website uses “Cookies”, which are small files that are placed on your device through your web browser when you visit this website. Information stored includes without limitation your specific preferences when using this website. It is to be noted that you can configure your browser not to store certain or any cookies on your device. Cookies can also help ensure the marketing you see online is more relevant to you and assist with your navigation.

Payment and Safety of Funds

The User is bound by any relevant agreements entered into between them and the relevant Windsor Brokers entity, including without limitation deposit and withdrawal methods. Withdrawals of funds are effected only upon the reception and approval of such requests by the relevant Windsor Brokers entity and in accordance with the timeframe, if any, of the particular payment provider. The User acknowledges and accepts the online payment methods offered by Windsor Brokers.
Windsor Brokers deals with several reputable banks. Users’ funds are held in segregated accounts, therefore ensuring the continued safety of funds.
The following companies facilitate payment services to companies operating under WindsorBrokers.com:
WB Global Ltd, a Cypriot company with registration number HE 343423, situated at 53 Spyrou Kyprianou, 4003 Limassol, Cyprus.
Windsor Solutions Ltd, a Cypriot company with registration number HE 383796, situated at 53 Spyrou Kyprianou, 4003 Limassol, Cyprus.
Moreover, for all payments related to the Paysafe Group, payment services will be facilitated by Windsor Brokers (BZ) Ltd, Windsor Brokers Ltd and Windsor Brokers International Ltd with their respective service regions.

Linked Sites and Limitation of Liability

Access to this website is provided on a “non-exclusive” and “non-transferable” basis. The User shall comply at all times with these T&Cs, in addition to any other agreements signed by the User. This website may contain hyperlinks to third-party websites, and as such, Windsor Brokers shall not be held accountable for the content and/or accuracy of information on any of those websites, and Windsor Brokers does not endorse the content within such websites. The Website is provided to the User on an “AS IS” and “AS AVAILABLE” basis. Windsor Brokers does not provide any warranties and/or guarantees of any kind.
Windsor Brokers, including its employees, officers, directors, affiliates, agents, service providers and licensors, does not warrant the accuracy, adequacy, completeness of the information, products and/or services within this website, and expressly disclaims liability for any errors, interruptions, losses, damages or inaccuracies in the information, products and/or services provided through this website.

Applicable Law and Jurisdiction

Access and use of this website is governed by the laws of Cyprus and the User submits to the exclusive jurisdiction of the Cyprus Courts for the adjudication of any disputes arising under these T&Cs and/or use of the website.
